summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 54th Place Southwest, from Alki Avenue to a point 400 feet southerly from the south margin of Alki Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8172 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
